title: CAN'T BUY CHAMPS FOR 6300 IP
body:
Hey.

I wanted to buy a champ for 6300 IP.. now i got 6400 IP, but i can't buy ANY 6300 IP Champ. I can buy champs for 450 IP - 4800 IP but not Champs for 6300 IP ! When im in the shop and trying to buy the 6300 ip champ the button turns gray and i cant click it. HELP. {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
This may be an issue if you're on the updated client.  Hop back on the legacy to show your accurate IP balance and get your champ!  

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
